entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this morning. High plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
